lexUnit.name: ago.prep
lexUnit.definition: COD: before the present (used with a measurement of time).

sentence.text: That was more than 500 years ago .
` I was one of the first chefs to put gastronomic vegetarian meals on the menu seven years ago .
Wales travelled to New Zealand five years ago and were crushed .
Jose Ramon , a new chef who arrived at the Guernica two months ago , will hopefully maintain these high standards .
` About a month ago , this tart came up to me in the Hassy saying she wanted some smack .
A DEMO tape from Robinson arrived in the NME office about a month ago .
A few weeks ago it would have scored claw marks on her heart .
Only two weeks ago they complained they could not afford to fund the teachers " pay award . "
If I 'd been in his shoes , I 'd probably have taken a meat axe to her weeks ago . "
John Lloyd , producer of Not The Nine O'Clock News , Spitting Image and Blackadder , says that for his generation of university students 20 years ago Python was the seminal programme .
As far as my old man could find out , it was abandoned two generations ago , or more .
A generation ago in the South , blacks could not even go to white lavatories or be buried in white cemeteries -- let alone compete for good jobs or live in white suburbs .
One morning not long ago he saw a fox walking past this same window .
Like North , Raskolnikov was appalled that such a small thing , so long ago , so distorted by his interrogator , should have incriminated him .
A dream I had not so long ago took me back to my first year in Vienna .
` Humankind condemned itself a long while ago to a perpetual diet of catastrophe .
Quite a while ago .
But he only said that a little while ago did n't he ?
` And yet six years ago the music of the sidh was heard in Ireland again , Fergus . "
Three months ago .
A century ago , as many as 5000 belugas or white whales lived in the St Lawrence River in eastern Canada .
The accident happened two years ago when he was trying to retrieve a football from the roof of the city 's derelict Rialto Ballroom .
He turned down Mr Thomas 's job a year or so ago , citing unfinished business at CCF .
` Even if he remembers , it 's a year and more ago now , and he 'll remember to forget . "
All that time ago -- did they never write ? "
` It wore out a minute or so ago .
This type makes up 70 per cent of new loans , although it was almost unheard of a decade ago .
Half an hour or so ago . "
